wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell  (29 September 1884 – 2 May 1973) was a senior British Army logistics officer in the Second World War.

response: Lindsell also gives its name to a surname. Examples include Augustine Lindsell and Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell.
*Lieutenant-General Sir Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell, , (6156), late Royal Regiment of Artillery, Colonel Commandant, Royal Artillery.
*Lieutenant General Sir Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell, K.B.E., D.S.O., M.C., Colonel Commandant, Royal Artillery.
*Major General (acting Lieutenant General) Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell  (late Royal Artillery).
*Wilfrid Gordon Lindsell (1884–1973), British Army logistics officer
